Meet the Team

About Us

We are a team of passionate aerospace engineering students dedicated to pushing the boundaries of innovation through hands-on projects and cutting-edge research. At AeroNovaX, we believe in learning by doing, creating solutions that matter, and sharing our knowledge with the world.
